alert.note: Alert for Marion; Monongalia; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 7:53PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN GREENE...SOUTHERN FAYETTE...MONONGALIA...NORTHWESTERN PRESTON AND CENTRAL MARION COUNTIES THROUGH 845 PM EST... At 752 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cassville to near Fairview to near Lumberport. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morgantown, Fairmont, Westover, Kingwood, Star City, Pleasant Valley, Winfield, Farmington, Barrackville, Point Marion, Monongah, and Granville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 68 in West Virginia between mile markers 1 and 28. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 2. Interstate 79 in West Virginia between mile markers 130 and 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Marion; Monongalia; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston
